I'm doing great, thanks for asking. I'm excited to be speaking with you about our new skin-lightening cream that's been making waves in the beauty community. We've had amazing feedback so far, and I think it could really benefit your skin, don't you?
I'm definitely interested in hearing more. I've tried various products before, but I'd love to know what makes this one unique.

Our cream is made with a proprietary blend of natural ingredients that have been clinically tested to provide noticeable results in just a few weeks. Unlike other products on the market that may just mask surface issues, our cream works from the inside out to even out your skin tone and leave you with a radiant, fairer complexion that's perfect for our local cultural celebrations.
That sounds promising, especially since it's backed by clinical testing. Can you tell me more about the key ingredients and how they work to enhance skin tone?

Our cream contains a unique combination of vitamin C, licorice extract, and lemon juice, which have been proven to inhibit melanin production and promote skin brightening. But what really sets our cream apart is the addition of our patented "BrightShield" complex, which is designed to lock in moisture and protect the skin from environmental stressors that can dull the complexion.
The ingredients and "BrightShield" complex sound quite impressive. How long does it generally take to start seeing visible results?

We've found that most of our customers start seeing noticeable results within 2-3 weeks of consistent use, with some even reporting a significant improvement in just 1 week. But the best part is, our cream is designed to be gentle and non-irritating, so you can use it daily without worrying about any adverse reactions. Many of our customers have even reported achieving the "dreamy" skin tone that's so coveted in our community within just a few months of regular use.
It's reassuring to know that it's gentle and shows results fairly quickly. Is there a recommended routine or any particular tips to maximize the benefits of this cream?

For optimal results, we recommend using our cream as part of a consistent skincare routine, morning and night, and combining it with a gentle exfoliating scrub 1-2 times a week to help remove dead skin cells and reveal brighter, smoother skin. Additionally, we have a special "SkinLightening Guide" that our customers can download, which includes personalized tips and advice on how to get the most out of our cream and achieve their desired level of skin brightness. Would you like me to send you a copy?
Yes, a guide would be helpful. Please go ahead and send me a copy. [REQUEST]

I'll send you the guide right away. And as a special bonus, I'd like to offer you a limited-time discount of 20% off your first purchase. If you decide to buy the cream within the next 48 hours, just use the code "SKINLIGHT20" at checkout to receive your discount. Would you like me to provide you with more information about the discount, or would you like to proceed with your purchase?
I'm interested in the discount. Could you provide a bit more detail about the offer?

With the code "SKINLIGHT20", you'll receive 20% off the full price of our skin-lightening cream, which normally retails for $99.99. But that's not all - if you use the code and complete a full 30-day supply of the cream, we'll also send you a complimentary travel-sized kit, perfect for touch-ups on-the-go. And, as an added incentive, we'll also throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not completely satisfied with the results, we'll give you a full refund.
That sounds like a great deal, especially with the money-back guarantee. I'll consider making a purchase with that offer soon.

We're confident that our cream will exceed your expectations, and we want to make sure you feel comfortable trying it out. And as a special final touch, I'd like to offer you a FREE consultation with one of our expert skincare specialists to help you customize your routine and get the most out of our cream. A consultation would be a fantastic opportunity to tailor my skincare routine. Please go ahead and schedule that for me. [REQUEST]
